title: Roasted chickpeas with nuts and/or seeds
description: You can use any selection of nuts and seeds that you fancy or, if you have a nut allergic guest, leave out the nuts and double up on the number of seeds. Free from: dairy, wheat, gluten, soya and eggs; can be nut-free
ingredients: 200g/7oz chickpeas, either soaked and cooked or tinned and drained
200g/7oz mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, pine nuts etc) and seeds (pumpkin, sunflower and so on)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
